pressToStart.name: Press-To-Start
pressToStart.description: When enabled, the car can be started by double-clicking your button to move forward, and then displays the vehicle menu screen.

automaticGearbox.name: Automatic gearbox
automaticGearbox.description: When enabled, double-clicking your button to move forward will put the car in DRIVE gear, and double-clicking your button to move backward will put the car in REVERSE gear. When combined with Press-To-Start, the car will start and shift directly into the specific gear.

remoteEngineStart.name: Remote engine start
remoteEngineStart.description: When enabled, the Press-To-Start and Automatic gearbox functions are applied as soon as you get into the car. However, if only one of the two options is active, this will be taken into account and only this one will be executed. If neither option is activated, only the vehicle menu opens.

debug.name: Debug
debug.description:
Enable debug mode.

If you don't know what this does, don't ask and don't enable it under any circumstances...
